message: Let's split fairly, I get a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good in later rounds.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I won't go below this
Time is running out, Alice. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Meet me in the middle
Okay, Alice, you got me. Let's split it right down the middle before we both lose out.
